post.body: he is a movie maker and a writer, what a talented little one you have there :o)
I've got 3 working swing tonight, I may just try and sneak some leftovers in on them ;o)
I lived in baltimore for 2 months a lifetime ago...never again will I live where it snows or without a cat ;o)
I hope so to.
yes it is :o) Its one of two kinds of snow I like. In pictures, or very far away .
It still happens often. You had the bad luck of a piece of crap finding your wallet. I am sorry this happened to you :o(
don't take it personally..twitter purged spammers yesterday. so now you just have real people on your list :o)
Thats sounds good, I may do that next time and of course pay attention to what I am doing.
I think I shall head to your place for breakfast ;o)
hahahahaha ;o)
Oh no, oh yuck! What an awful surprise that must have been . I just have milk so hopefully I didn't mess this up.
Its been one of those days, I shall console myself with a square of chocolate and a cup of coffee
cinnamon would have been a lovely surprise, I suspect meat tenderizer :o(
mmmmmmmmmmm now that sounds yummy !
Oh dear ! at 9 open my computer protests. Thankfully mine is nearly all for play ;o)
Welcome to my twitter, thank you for the follow back. I hope your having a good evening
Its the people of twitterville, your afraid to turn your back for a second and miss them doing somthing really cool ;o)
I will update as soon as I get answer. Poor@TrafficGen everyone is going to have chores for him ;o)
Sadly this is true both on and offline.
Um..er..thanks..I think...maybe its best If I just ignore this tweet..too late :o(
I agree..and can't believe I admitted that out loud. Which also implies I have either watched jackass or bam .
no your not the only one, it is truely just another day. But people get all excited about it so I wish them a happy new year
Sounds like a great way to spend the day...have fun :o)
ok so you promise to follow back if I follow, but your already following me. So, can I get you to take out the garbage instead?
Holy Cow !! That is cool!!
It started as a week and a half headache and turned into a respiratory thing.
California..I am a wimp :o(
I swear whatever it is just keeps making the rounds..oh well its just that time of year. Glad your over it :o)
I sometimes feel the same way she does
I am too! I am done with the cold and the dark and the fog.
I am hoping for productive, but not putting all my hopes in theat basket.
well of course ! no day is complete without @abiteofsanity ;o)
should start dinner soon , we will see if that actually happens.
Well I do not know what I put on my toast but it sure wasn't the garlic powder I meant to :o(
Finaly get to come and play and now I am starving :o(
Today my vaporizer is my best friend :o)
From now on if I am half asleep, someone else needs to take out wide awake dogs
Said not siad. granted my spelling leaves a lot to be desired but I can manage to get the simple words right...most of the time :o(
Siad to myself, I can play until 8 and then get to work, looked up at clock and saw it was 8:16. Appears I need to revise my plans a bit
Good morning twitterville..I will stay on the sickie side of town so as not to infect anyone :o(
